text:
(...Everything seems to be going smoothly, everyone's
having fun, it looks like it'll end on a good note.)

Producer-san,
would you like some roasted sweet potatoes?

Ah, yeah!
Can I have some?

Hehe...!
I felt the same just now.

With lessons, fun, and lots of memories,
it was a two-night, three-day blast!

From now on, let's keep making
more great memories like this.
